thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 7 of 265
thread.title: Debbie

author: Debbie
title: Debbie
text: I was very apprehensive about trying Hello Fresh as I am a very pick eater--but it was a wonderful surprise! Great meal selection; fresh, beautiful ingredients and easy to follow guides. Love the way the box is packed also! Meals have allowed me to stay in my comfort zone but try new things at the same time. My husband and I have enjoyed every single meal and would readily order them again! You cannot go wrong with Hello Fresh. It is now approved by this picky eater!
